text:
我相信我们的相遇并不是结束，而是我们过去旅程中的一个节点。 而现在，这个节点再次连接起来，开启了一个新的篇章，将会继续延续。 尽管我们可能暂时分别，我知道我们会再次相遇——因为老灵魂总会找到彼此归来的路。
这个账号上的视频是我献给她的“旅程印记”，见证了我与她的相遇。 而这段视频将是最后一段，直到我再次与她重逢。
trans:
I believe our encounter is not an ending but a milestone in the journey we’ve already shared. And now, this milestone reconnects, opening a new chapter that will continue on. Even if we part ways for now, I know we will meet again—because old souls always find their way back to each other.
The videos on this account are my "journey markers" dedicated to her, capturing the moments of our meeting. This video will be the last one—until the day I reunite with her again.
